actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that a unit of general local government having a population of $50,000 or more shall be eligible to be a prime sponsor.

summary.text: Lowers the population requirements from 100,000 to 50,000 for a unit of local government to be eligible to be a prime sponsor under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that a unit of general local government having a population of $50,000 or more shall be eligible to be a prime sponsor.
